## Navigator class

Class responsible for determining where focus should move in response to keyboard navigation commands.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Navigator 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [rules](./blockly.navigator.rules.md) | <code>protected</code> | RuleList&lt;any&gt; | Map from classes to a corresponding ruleset to handle navigation from instances of that class. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addNavigationPolicy(policy)](./blockly.navigator.addnavigationpolicy.md) |  | Adds a navigation ruleset to this Navigator. |
|  [getFirstChild(current)](./blockly.navigator.getfirstchild.md) |  | Returns the first child of the given object instance, if any. |
|  [getNextSibling(current)](./blockly.navigator.getnextsibling.md) |  | Returns the next sibling of the given object instance, if any. |
|  [getParent(current)](./blockly.navigator.getparent.md) |  | Returns the parent of the given object instance, if any. |
|  [getPreviousSibling(current)](./blockly.navigator.getprevioussibling.md) |  | Returns the previous sibling of the given object instance, if any. |
